title: Trump's Russia Showdown - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/19/17
itunes:title: Trump's Russia Showdown - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/19/17
description:
George Noory and guest Stephen Cohen discuss the growing tensions between the United States and Russia, and whether there are secret motives behind President Trump's increasingly hard line stance with Vladimir Putin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
